mapper.html:
Hi {{1.object.billing_details.name}}! 

Thank you for signing up.

Before we can start optimising your landing page, website or design we need to setup a meeting. We will connect with you and have a small talk about your business. This way we have a better understanding about your needs and can make sure we tackle the right issues first.
 
Click here to schedule a meeting

Looking forward to be in touch and get that conversion growing. 

In the meanwhile you can start with this first conversion advice: http://bit.ly/2YOoCD5

Kind regards,
Ely Fornoville
Landing Page Specialist
+32 477 80 24 68
Landing Page Specialist
mapper.subject: Welcome to Landing Page Specialist
